metadata.description: Picking up from the literal ashes of 30 Days of Night, this new printing of the first sequel, 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, follows Stella Olemaun's efforts to warn the world about the threat the vampires pose - the vampires who overran Barrow, Alaska, killing her husband and most of the town.
metadata.name: 30 Days of Night, Vol. 2: Dark Days
